name: Amazon In Danger
description:
GAME OBJECTIVE

The Amazon rainforest has aggressive tourists, deforestation, pollution, ranching, mining, urban development, and many more perils affecting the natural habitat. The objective of the game is to get through a series of obstacles that will show the viewer/player the reality of how the amazon is being destroyed. It will bring awareness to the situation. 

INSTRUCTIONS
  • Mouse - to look around
  • Up Arrow - to move forward
  • Down Arrow - to move backward
  • Right Arrow - to move to the right
  • Left Arrow - to move to the left
